ing: 1 (1 ounce) package dry ranch salad dressing mix
des: "Excellent as a side dish or use on steaks or chicken as a sauce. Flavored with butter and dry ranch mix, these are just too easy for as good as they are. Any mushroom will work but Portabellas are outstanding"
ins: Melt the butter over low heat. Mix in dry ranch salad dressing mix. Add mushrooms, and stir to coat. Cook, stirring frequently, until the mushrooms are very tender, at least 30 minutes.
